content: From a backlog perspective, total remaining performance obligations were $290.6 million, up 6% year-over-year and current RPO, which we expect to recognize over the next 12 months was $145 million, an increase of 10% from a year ago. In Q2, we expect total revenue in the range of $56 million to $58 million, representing growth of 35% to 40% and an acceleration in top line growth from the first quarter and prior fiscal year. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. And so, yeah, I guess the real competitors for CIO who wants to build him or herself and we just have to let that process run its course because it's virtually impossible, they're going to succeed at it and after they get through after the crash and burn like they have done virtually every one of our customers, then we come in and bail them out, it's just -- it's just a natural part of the process and we've got the new technology. Your line is open.
